5df75cf16b05c.Name: LLPG - MYSERVICES - address postcode lookup
5df75cf16b05c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality,
usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

591f0c47c72b0.Name: LLPG Firmstep
591f0c47c72b0.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","new_category":"LLPG","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","lookup_validation":"0","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,
pao as house,
street_name as street,
town_name as town , 
county_name as county,
postcode,
uprn,ward,lng,lat, locality_name as locality, usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100"}

props.label: staticText 1
props.content:
Before You Begin

You must provide online payment to transfer this licence after completing the form. After clicking the submit button at the end of the form you will be taken to our secure online payment website. You can then make the required payment using either a credit or a debit card.

Cost of application: £{paymentCost}

Please be aware that your session may time out.

Once you have entered a valid email address below, you can save your progress at any time by clicking the 'Save' button that will appear at the bottom of the page. When you press the 'Save' button, you will receive an email from 'noreply@brentwood.gov.uk' containing a link to continue your form. Please ensure you save regularly so you do not lose your progress.

props.label: Enter an email address to save your application (recommended)
props.maximumLengthMessage: Please input no more than _max_value_ characters
props.validationMaskMessage: Please input text of the format: _validation_mask_

props.label: staticText 2
props.content:
Before completing this form, please read the Premises Licence Transfer Guidance Notes (opens in new tab).

Where applicable (if demonstrating a right to work via the Home Office online right to work checking service), please enter the 9-digit ‘share code’ provided to the applicant by that service (please see note 15 for information). If not applicable enter 'n/a'.

props.label: staticText 14
props.content: I,

props.label: Name of the applicant
props.maximumLengthMessage: Please input no more than _max_value_ characters
props.validationMaskMessage: Please input text of the format: _validation_mask_

Please ensure you save regularly so you do not lose your progress.

props.label: staticText 6
props.content:
Part 2 - Transfer Documentation

Please be aware that your session may time out. 

You can save your progress at any time by clicking the 'Save' button that will appear at the bottom of the page. When you press the 'Save' button, you will receive an email from 'noreply@brentwood.gov.uk' containing a link to continue your form. Please ensure you save regularly so you do not lose your progress.

props.label: Are you the holder of the premises licence under an interim authority notice?
Do you wish to transfer with immediate effect?
If not, when would you like the transfer to take effect?
props.minimumValueMessage: Please input a date no earlier than _min_value_
props.maximumValueMessage: Please input a date no later than _max_value_
props.dateFormatMessage: Please input a date in the format _date_format_

props.label: staticText 10
props.content:
In order to transfer a premises licence, the existing premises licence holder must complete a consent form. This is available on our website as a separate online form.

Alternatively, the consent form is available as a pdf, which can be sent to: Licensing, Brentwood Borough Council, Town Hall, Ingrave Road, Brentwood, Essex CM15 8AY. Please include the reference number for this form, which will be produced when you submit it.

props.label: Are you able to submit a copy of the consent form?

listOfValues.label: I can upload the consent form now
I will submit the consent form separately
I am unable to submit the consent form

props.label: Upload Right to Work documentation
props.fileTypeMessage: Sorry, you can only upload files of type _file_type_. Please choose a different file.

props.label: staticText 13
props.content:
IT IS AN OFFENCE, UNDER SECTION 158 OF THE LICENSING ACT 2003, TO MAKE A FALSE STATEMENT IN OR IN CONNECTION WITH THIS APPLICATION. THOSE WHO MAKE A FALSE STATEMENT MAY BE LIABLE ON SUMMARY CONVICTION TO A FINE OF ANY AMOUNT.

IT IS AN OFFENCE UNDER SECTION 24B OF THE IMMIGRATION ACT 1971 FOR A PERSON TO WORK WHEN THEY KNOW, OR HAVE REASONABLE CAUSE TO BELIEVE, THAT THEY ARE DISQUALIFIED FROM DOING SO BY REASON OF THEIR IMMIGRATION STATUS. THOSE WHO EMPLOY AN ADULT WITHOUT LEAVE OR WHO IS SUBJECT TO CONDITIONS AS TO EMPLOYMENT WILL BE LIABLE TO A CIVIL PENALTY UNDER SECTION 15 OF THE IMMIGRATION, ASYLUM AND NATIONALITY ACT 2006 AND, PURSUANT TO SECTION 21 OF THE SAME ACT, WILL BE COMMITTING AN OFFENCE WHERE THEY DO SO IN THE KNOWLEDGE, OR WITH REASONABLE CAUSE TO BELIEVE, THAT THE EMPLOYEE IS DISQUALIFIED.

I understand I am not entitled to be issued with a licence if I do not have the entitlement to live and work in the UK (or if I am subject to a condition preventing me from doing work relating to the carrying on of a licensable activity) and that my licence will become invalid if I cease to be entitled to live and work in the UK (please read guidance note 2)

props.label: staticText 15
props.content:
Part 3 - Signatures (please read guidance note 3)

Signature of applicant or applicant's solicitor or other duly authorised agent (see guidance note 4). If signing on behalf of the applicant, please state in what capacity.

Please be aware that your session may time out. 

You can save your progress at any time by clicking the 'Save' button that will appear at the bottom of the page. When you press the 'Save' button, you will receive an email from 'noreply@brentwood.gov.uk' containing a link to continue your form. Please ensure you save regularly so you do not lose your progress.
